short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remembering our Ancestors: By Lynne Hardy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This ode to respecting the past depicts two Indigenous youths on horseback passing by a cliffside with petroglyphs. Indigenous youth are often encouraged to remember and learn from the past to create a better future. 

Lynne Hardy (she/her) is a Navajo artist raised in Grey Mountain and Flagstaff, AZ. She creates modern, colorful, illustrated depictions of her indigenous people and customs.
